settings.promo_1_description_1: We invited actress Jane Marshall to join us for the day and choose her perfect outfit from our vast range of womens fashion.
settings.promo_1_description_2: This is of course not true as this is just a design for a website and this is simply filler text.
settings.promo_2_subtitle: Add looks or items to your lookbook for a chance of winning
settings.promo_2_description_1: See an item or a complete look you like, click the ♡ button to add it to your lookbook and you'll be automatically entered to our monthly draw where one winner gets a £300 gift voucher to spend on our website!
settings.promo_2_description_2: Terms: No purchase necessary. Vouchers are non-transferrable and no cash alternative is offered. Competition is for members only.
settings.promo_2_terms: Terms: No purchase necessary. Vouchers are non-transferrable and no cash option is given. You must be 18 or over to be eligible. Competition is for members only and is drawn at random.
